movie.title: Hitman
movie.tagline: Most believe his very existence is a sin. But others know he is a necessary evil.
movie.description: A genetically engineered assassin with deadly aim, known only as "Agent 47" eliminates strategic targets for a top-secret organization. But when he's double-crossed, the hunter becomes the prey as 47 finds himself in a life-or-death game of international intrigue.
